actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology

official_title: To amend the Federal Reserve Act to require the production of Federal reserve notes in a manner which enables an individual who is blind to determine the denomination of each such note, and for other purposes.
short_title: Catherine Skivers Currency for All Act

summary.text: Catherine Skivers Currency for All Act - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to require each federal reserve note whose denomination is $50 or less to be trimmed in a prescribed manner so as to make the denomination recognizable to an individual who is blind.

titles.title: Catherine Skivers Currency for All Act

To amend the Federal Reserve Act to require the production of Federal reserve notes in a manner which enables an individual who is blind to determine the denomination of each such note, and for other purposes.
